thread.section_title: Hotel Nord Nuova Roma - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Brief stay overnight in central Rome
thread.title_full: Brief stay overnight in central Rome - Review of Hotel Nord Nuova Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: ChrisKiwi
title: Brief stay overnight in central Rome
text: This small hotel has all you need for a stay in Rome: central location just 5 minutes walk from the Termini and 20 minutes walk down Via Cavour to the Coliseum and Forum areas; free and fast wifi; free breakfast; spotlessly clean facilities; lots of character; and helpful pleasant staff. My room was a single but was spacious with a comfy bed, a desk and modern bathroom.
